scripts.serve: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=watch  NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css --watch"  "live-server ./public --no-browser"
scripts.development: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=watch  NODE_ENV=development postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css
scripts.production: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=build  NODE_ENV=production postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css

name: postcss-plugin-demo
description: Demo for a custom Tailwind CSS plugin, @downwindcss/flex-center utility.  https://www.npmjs.com/package/@downwindcss/flex-center
